content:
# It seems that the copper furnace has successfully smelted the copper ore into 10 copper plates, but my inventory still does not reflect the copper plates. 
# This indicates that I need to extract the copper plates from the furnace output.

# Let's extract the produced copper plates from the copper furnace to my inventory.
extracted_copper_plates = extract_item(Prototype.CopperPlate, copper_furnace.position, quantity=10)  # Extracting all the plates produced
print(f'Extracted {extracted_copper_plates} copper plates from the furnace at position {copper_furnace_position}.')  # Confirming extraction

# Checking inventory after extraction to reflect new item counts.
print(f"Inventory after extraction: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Final check of the inventory after extraction

# Now that I have the copper plates, I can proceed to craft the electronic circuits needed for the Assembling Machine.
# The recipe for electronic circuits requires:
# - 3 copper cables (which can be crafted from copper plates)
# - 1 iron plate

# Let's first check how many copper cables I can craft with the copper plates I have.
copper_cable_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.CopperCable)  # Retrieve the recipe for copper cables
print(f'Copper Cable Recipe: {copper_cable_recipe}')  # Check the recipe and its required materials

# Each copper cable requires 1 copper plate. Since I have 10 copper plates, I can craft 10 copper cables.
craft_item(Prototype.CopperCable, quantity=10)  # Crafting 10 copper cables
print(f"Inventory after crafting copper cables: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after crafting copper cables

# Now, I will need to craft the electronic circuits using the copper cables and iron plates.
# I will craft as many electronic circuits as I can with the resources available. Each circuit requires 3 copper cables and 1 iron plate.
# Since I have 10 copper cables and 10 iron plates, I can craft 3 electronic circuits (using 9 copper cables and 3 iron plates).

craft_item(Prototype.ElectronicCircuit, quantity=3)  # Crafting 3 electronic circuits
print(f"Inventory after crafting electronic circuits: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Final check of the inventory after crafting electronic circuits

# With the electronic circuits ready, I can now craft the Assembling Machine. Let's proceed to do that!
